org.musicbrainz.discid
Class LibDiscId

java.lang.Object
  org.musicbrainz.discid.LibDiscId

public class LibDiscId
extends java.lang.Object

Direct translator for MusicBrainz libdiscid, as found at http://musicbrainz.org/doc/libdiscid

While it is possible, this class is not intended to be used directly. Please use the DiscInfo utility class.

Author:
Andrew Taylor
See Also:
DiscInfo

getSubmissionURL

public java.net.URL getSubmissionURL()
                              throws DiscIdException
Return an URL for submitting the DiscID to MusicBrainz. The URL leads to an interactive disc submission wizard that guides the user through the process of associating this disc's DiscID with a release in the MusicBrainz database. The returned string is only valid as long as the DiscId object exists.

Parameters:
d - a DiscId object created by discid_new()
Returns:
a string containing an URL
Throws:
DiscIdException

getWebServiceURL

public java.lang.String getWebServiceURL()
                                  throws DiscIdException
Return an URL for retrieving CD information from MusicBrainz' web service The URL provides the CD information in XML. See http://musicbrainz.org/development/mmd for details. The returned string is only valid as long as the DiscId object exists.

Returns:
a string containing an URL
Throws:
DiscIdException

getTrackOffset

public int getTrackOffset(int trackNum)
                   throws DiscIdException
Return the sector offset of a track. Only track numbers between (and including) discid_get_first_track_num() and discid_get_last_track_num() may be used.

Parameters:
trackNum - the number of a track
Returns:
sector offset of the specified track
Throws:
DiscIdException

getTrackLength

public int getTrackLength(int trackNum)
                   throws DiscIdException
Return the length of a track in sectors. Only track numbers between (and including) discid_get_first_track_num() and discid_get_last_track_num() may be used.

Parameters:
d - a DiscId object created by discid_new()
track_num - the number of a track
Returns:
length of the specified track
Throws:
DiscIdException
